name: Sea Turtle - An Addictive Game
description:
Guide your Turtle to safety and collect pearls whilst avoiding the dangerous jellyfish,octopus,crab and clams.
Tap to stay a float, and collect the pearls as you go.

· One-touch control system!
· Simple and addictive gameplay!
. Game Center challenges!
. FREE!




Credits:
Graphics is designed by Freepik and Vecteezy.com
